topic.title: How would you describe "corruption" in biological terms?
topic.body:
I believe that when corruption spreads in a society, it ends up contaminating everything (cancer). It explains why the corrupts prioritize so much the control of the medias outlets (neuro-degenerative illnesses).

Ex: Corruption in western societies is already so advanced that publicly proofed child-rapists can get immunity cards from the whole judicial system of the USA/UK.

The consequence is to learn to live in Trustlessness, the real Dark Ages. Is a therapeutic safe? Impossible to tell. A plane? A tank? Or even a general...

1615820872_1BWgyS5ThxyuzEWWj2dats3sgQBpp.body:
Personally, I believe it's mostly feudalistic Whites, using Jews who have renounced Judaism, to be able to play the antisemitic card and have an option if or when their plans fail, to say it was the Jews.

A proven effective strategy. There wasn't a single Haredi at Epstein's events, but unsurprisingly some former POTUSes.

"Activist swarmed by group of attackers after protesting against use of puberty-blocking drugs on children "
https://www.rt.com/news/518047-anti-trans-activist-attacked/

Heretics.
